It is great to see the intersection of Pine Grove and Masonboro Loop finally being re-align after the city of Wilmington delaying of the project for over 7 years when they annex the area and put a hold on the state funding.   



My question is with school starting in 10 days, how long will it be before the intersection is available to handle the onslaught of school traffic form Parsley?
